segments.text: Wow, I can't believe what I'm seeing here.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: There's water overflowing from the sink, and that woman is just standing there, drying dishes.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's completely unaware of the water at her feet, it's incredible.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And those kids, trying to sneak cookies from the jar, are something else.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That boy is really going out on a limb, literally, to get those cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool he's standing on looks like it's about to tip over any second.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I'm surprised the girl is just standing there, waiting for a cookie, not saying a word.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole scene is just full of surprises, I can't look away.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder what's going to happen next, it's like watching a train wreck in slow motion.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside looks so calm and peaceful, it's a stark contrast to the chaos inside.
segments.speaker: PAR
